GeneDef.label: absolute heathen
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively believe that there's no harm in letting the void visit our reality, and this belief causes them to refuse to suppress entities.

GeneDef.label: heathen
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively dislike the idea of suppressing entities visiting from the void, and as a result won't be effective at doing so.\n\nWARNING: Due to how suppression work is handled, you probably don't want this on your warden.

GeneDef.label: minor heathen
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively dislike the idea of suppressing entities visiting from the void, and as a result will be slightly less effective at doing so.\n\nWARNING: Due to how suppression work is handled, you probably don't want this on your warden.

GeneDef.label: decent crusader
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively seek to stop the darkness that creeps out from the void, making them slightly better at suppressing anomalies.

GeneDef.label: crusader
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively seek to stop the darkness that creeps out from the void, making them better at suppressing anomalies.

GeneDef.label: good crusader
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively seek to stop the darkness that creeps out from the void, making them a lot better at suppressing anomalies.

GeneDef.label: exceptional crusader
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively seek to stop the invaders from the void, making them exceptionally good at suppressing anomalies.

GeneDef.label: super crusader
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene instinctively seek to stop the invaders from the void, making them super good at suppressing anomalies.

GeneDef.label: amazing crusader
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are so unbelievably good at suppressing entities that things are much less likely to go wrong when they're around.

GeneDef.label: minor archite enhanced crusader
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites throughout their bodies that assist with suppressing entities.

GeneDef.label: archite enhanced crusader
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a small number of archites throughout their bodies that assist with suppressing entities.

GeneDef.label: major archite enhanced crusader
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a large number of archites throughout their bodies that assist with suppressing entities.
